mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.equity_sell_id AS "equitySellId", a.buy_num AS "buyNum", a.buy_userid as "buyUserid", a.buy_money AS "buyMoney", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", u.login_name AS "user.loginName", u.name AS "user.name"
left join sys_user u on u.id=a.buy_userid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equity_buy( id, equity_sell_id, buy_num, buy_userid, buy_money, create_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{equitySellId}, #{buyNum}, #{buyUserid}, #{buyMoney}, now(), #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE equity_buy SET equity_sell_id = #{equitySellId}, buy_num = #{buyNum}, buy_userid = #{buyUserid}, buy_money = #{buyMoney}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_user s SET s.wkf = wkf + #{buyNum} * #{buyMoney} *0.85, s.happyfood = happyfood - #{buyNum}, s.yxf = yxf + #{buyNum} * #{buyMoney} *0.05 WHERE id = #{equitySell.tradingId}
